aboutPage.title: AI-assisted diagnosis for canine leishmaniasis
aboutPage.subtitle: Backend API + ML pipeline to support veterinarians with predictions and confidence scores.
aboutPage.overview1: AI tool to support vets in diagnosing canine leishmaniasis.
aboutPage.overview2: Includes backend API and machine learning workflow.
aboutPage.backend1: FastAPI with PostgreSQL, SQLAlchemy and Alembic.
aboutPage.backend3: Endpoints for users, roles, owners, breeds, animals, assessments and predictions.
aboutPage.backend4: Seeds, CORS, tests with Pytest, managed with Poetry and Docker for DB.
aboutPage.ml1: EDA and model comparison (LogReg, RF, XGBoost, SVM).
aboutPage.ml3: Final model: balanced Logistic Regression with saved artifacts (.joblib).
aboutPage.usage1: Interactive docs at /docs once backend is running.
aboutPage.usage2: Seed data with `poetry run task seed` to load roles/users/breeds and CSV.
aboutPage.usage3: Prediction endpoint `/predict` returns diagnosis and confidence.
